titles.title: The Center for Strategic Deterrence and Weapons of Mass Destruction Studies Act of 2025
The Center for Strategic Deterrence and Weapons of Mass Destruction Studies Act of 2025

To amend title 10, United States Code, to establish the Center for Strategic Deterrence and Weapons of Mass Destruction Studies in the Institute for National Strategic Studies of National Defense University.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
